entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SaveChangesAsync is slow due to cascade delete #34718
    Backlog
  • Cosmos: consider warning/error when attempting to save and a partition key is unset #34716
  • Apostrophe symbol in SQL Server column description is scaffolded as ' #34714
    Backlog
  • Support ExecuteUpdate/Delete with view mapping where the column name differs between the table and view #34713
    Backlog

Closed

  • How to map a view derived from a table, including fk #34694
  • How to handle "The entry point exited without ever building an IHost" #34715
  • DbCommandInterceptors receives obsolete Command Source #34678
  • ExecuteUpdate/Delete attempt to update the view, not the table #34677
    10.0.0
  • How to load ALL items in a lazy collection navigation, when referenced from a child entity? #34622

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34719
  • [release/9.0] Rename IncludeRootDiscriminatorInJsonId to HasRootDiscriminatorInJsonId #34717
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Use the correct comparer when sorting relational functions. #34712
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.0
  • Remove package source mapping and suppress warning #34711
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • Handle view mapping in ExecuteDelete/Update translation #34709

Updated

  • Allow using foreign keys in Dataverse reverse engineering #34689
  • Solves the problem of getting project MSBuild information #34574
